title: Health Influencer, Becky LaChance, Uses Chino Valley Ranchers’ Liquid Egg Whites for Post Workout Recipe
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Becky LaChance, a popular healthy-living enthusiast, blogger and influencer, recently shared her favorite breakfast recipe using Chino Valley Ranchers’ Cage Free Liquid Egg Whites. The recipe was shared on her Instagram feed (@becksliveshealthy) and website. 

Chino Valley Ranchers, an egg producer and distributor, has been producing high-quality eggs since their business began in the 1950s. The company was one of the first to adopt the organic egg concept and has become one of the leading organic egg providers in the country.

“We’re going on almost 30 years of cage-free eggs,” said Chris Nichols, co-owner of Chino Valley Ranchers. “We take pride in our eggs and it’s exciting to see our customers sharing wonderful ways to use them in a wide variety of excellent recipes.”

In her post, LaChance features her favorite post-workout banana and egg white oatmeal recipe. This is LaChance’s go-to recipe for replenishing energy stores and repairing muscle fibers after each workout. She describes the added benefit of protein and other nutrients from Chino Valley Ranchers’ eggs. “Not only do I add Chino Valley Ranchers’ liquid egg whites for extra protein,” said LaChance, “They also make the oats more filling and so fluffy!”

LaChance, who is a registered nurse, certified personal fitness trainer and a marathon runner, writes about living a healthy lifestyle on her blog and Instagram page. Her 71,000+ followers see her as a role model and turn to her for fitness and food tips. You can find LaChance’s banana and egg white stovetop oatmeal on her blog here.

For those looking for delicious, fat-free egg whites, Chino Valley Ranchers offers 100% Liquid Egg Whites, which are completely pasteurized and ready to use right out of the carton. This product is available at Mother’s Market, Sprouts and other various grocery stores.

To learn more about Chino Valley Ranchers’ high quality, healthy eggs, visit their website at www.ChinoValleyRanchers.com or contact them at (800) 354-4503.
